org.opends.server.backends.pluggable

Interface SuffixContainer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EntryContainer

    public interface SuffixContainer
extends Closeable
    Container for a whole suffix environment which stores all entries from the subtree of the suffix' baseDN. A suffix container has a set of key-value stores a.k.a indexes. It stores entries in these key-values stores and maintain the indexes all in sync on updates.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String ATTR_DEBUG_SEARCH_INDEX
      The attribute used to return a search index debug string to the client.
      static String DN2ID_INDEX_NAME
      The name of the index associating normalized DNs to ids.
      static String ID2CHILDREN_COUNT_NAME
      The name of the index associating an entry id to the number of immediate children below it.
      static String ID2CHILDREN_INDEX_NAME
      The name of the index associating an entry id to the entry id set of all its children, i.e. its immediate children.
      static String ID2ENTRY_INDEX_NAME
      The name of the index associating entry ids to entries.
      static String ID2SUBTREE_INDEX_NAME
      The name of the index associating an entry id to the entry id set of all its subordinates, i.e. the children, grand-children, grand-grand-children, ....
      static String REFERRAL_INDEX_NAME
      The name of the index associating normalized DNs to normalized URIs.
      static String STATE_INDEX_NAME
      The name of the index which associates indexes with their trust state, i.e.

    • Field Detail

      • DN2ID_INDEX_NAME

        static final String DN2ID_INDEX_NAME
        The name of the index associating normalized DNs to ids. LDAP DNs uniquely identify entries.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ID2ENTRY_INDEX_NAME

        static final String ID2ENTRY_INDEX_NAME
        The name of the index associating entry ids to entries. Entry ids are monotonically increasing unique longs and entries are serialized versions of LDAP entries.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ID2CHILDREN_INDEX_NAME

        static final String ID2CHILDREN_INDEX_NAME
        The name of the index associating an entry id to the entry id set of all its children, i.e. its immediate children.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ID2CHILDREN_COUNT_NAME

        static final String ID2CHILDREN_COUNT_NAME
        The name of the index associating an entry id to the number of immediate children below it.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ID2SUBTREE_INDEX_NAME

        static final String ID2SUBTREE_INDEX_NAME
        The name of the index associating an entry id to the entry id set of all its subordinates, i.e. the children, grand-children, grand-grand-children, ....
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • REFERRAL_INDEX_NAME

        static final String REFERRAL_INDEX_NAME
        The name of the index associating normalized DNs to normalized URIs.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • STATE_INDEX_NAME

        static final String STATE_INDEX_NAME
        The name of the index which associates indexes with their trust state, i.e. does the index needs to be rebuilt ?
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        static final String ATTR_DEBUG_SEARCH_INDEX
